events.message: Applicant has submitted a personal loan application to cover medical expenses incurred last month.
Loan application was categorised under the Personal Loan segment due to medical expense indication.
A loan officer has been assigned to the applicant to assist through the personal loan process.
Initial review completed, noting the applicant’s steady income stream and significant medical costs.
Requested supporting medical bills, proof of income, and identification documents to proceed.
Applicant has submitted all the requested documentation including recent payslips and hospital invoices.
Credit report obtained showing good credit history and no delinquent accounts reported recently.
Risk analysis conducted highlighting moderate risk due to existing credit utilization but stable income.
Loan offer made to the applicant with favorable terms considering their stable employment and credit.
Applicant responded positively to the offer and expressed readiness to proceed with signing.
Application escalated to senior management for approval due to loan amount exceeding standard limits.
Loan approved by senior management after thorough review and confirmation of applicant’s eligibility.
Funds have been disbursed to the applicant’s designated bank account as per loan agreement.
Follow-up call conducted to ensure applicant is satisfied and aware of repayment schedule details.
Loan application process officially closed after successful funding and follow-up confirmation.
